2010-11-03

Movember 2010: Favourite moustaches #2 Lee Hazlewood

During November I'm growing a 'tache to raise money for prostate cancer - come sponsor me over here...

The thing about Lee's 'tache is that no one should look cool with that on their face... but Lee does ... incredibly cool - unfeasibly cool - I'm going for this amount of cool, I suspect I'll fall a long way short!
